column1: Little Goat Diner////I am glad Little Goat was there to catch the overflow from Girl across the street.  I've been wanting to try Girl & the Goat for quite some time and thought tonight was the night as I've trekked a mile on foot and in the rain with determination to get here.  But alas
column2: the waiting list at the Girl was "uncomfortably long" when we arrived and so we made our way across the street.
